alert.note: Alert for Lipscomb; Ochiltree; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 4:23PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Beaver, eastern Texas, western Lipscomb, northwestern Roberts and Ochiltree Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 423 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles south of Liberal to 10 miles southeast of Spearman. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Perryton, Beaver, Booker, Forgan, Wolf Creek Park, Elmwood, Farnsworth, Boyd, Floris, Bryans Corner, Mocane, Turpin and Balko. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
